name: keys
description: The keyring to modern tools - A marketplace of structured assets that unlock practical capability in Cursor, Jupyter, GitHub, Stripe, and more

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend
scripts.db:reconcile: echo 'Run migration: backend/supabase/migrations/00000000000000_backend_contract_reconcile.sql in Supabase SQL editor'
